body_html:
Yes, this is a bug and happens because the second case dispatches to our THNN implementation, which doesn't support broadcasting and has much more strict requirements.
This should be fixed, probably by removing the dependency on THNN altogether.
For information, the same will happen with l1_loss.

For information, the same will happen with l1_loss.
body:
Yes, this is a bug and happens because the second case dispatches to our `THNN` implementation, which doesn't support broadcasting and has much more strict requirements.
This should be fixed, probably by removing the dependency on THNN altogether.
For information, the same will happen with `l1_loss`.
